item.title: Tippu's maulUdi - frontline
item.description: NIDHIN G. OLIKARA Print edition : September 10, 2021 Nidhin G. Olikara is an independent researcher based in Shivamogga. His primary area of academic interest is the ‘History of Mysore under Haidar Ali and Tipu Sultan’. A Persian manuscript in the British Library in London and other documents help correct an error in Tipu Sultan’s birthdate. The ensuing research also offers a fresh insight into the mind of the Mysore ruler.
